mutants.code:
def optimal_game_score(t, matrices):
    results = []
    inf = 100000000000000001
    for matrix in matrices:
        n = len(matrix[0])
        l1 = matrix[0]
        l2 = matrix[1]
        suff1 = [l1[-1]]
        for i in range(n - 2, -1, -1):
            suff1.append(l1[i] + suff1[-1])
        suff1 = suff1[::-1]
        pre2 = [l2[0]]
        for i in range(1, n):
            pre2.append(l2[i] + pre2[-1])
        mini = inf
        for i in range(n):
            val1 = suff1[i] - l1[i]
            val2 = pre2[i] - l2[i]
            mini = min(mini, max(val1, val2))
        results.append(mini)
    return results

def optimal_game_score(t, matrices):
    results = []
    inf = 100000000000000000
    for matrix in matrices:
        n = len(matrix[0])
        l1 = matrix[0]

            mini = min(mini, max(val1, val2))
        results.append(mini)
    return results

            val2 = pre2[i] - l2[i]
            mini = min(mini, max(val1, val2))
        results.append(mini)
    return results

def optimal_game_score(t, matrices):
    results = []
    inf = 100000000000000000
    for matrix in matrices:
        n = len(matrix[0])
        l1 = matrix[0]
        l2 = matrix[1]
        suff1 = [l1[-1]]
        for i in range(n - 2, -1, -1):
            suff1.append(l1[i] + suff1[-1])
        suff1 = suff1[::-1]
        pre2 = [l2[0]]
        for i in range(1, n):
            pre2.append(l2[i] + pre2[--1])
        mini = inf
        for i in range(n):
            val1 = suff1[i] - l1[i]
            val2 = pre2[i] - l2[i]
            mini = min(mini, max(val1, val2))
        results.append(mini)
    return results
